item.title: 03. Common Dart Manipulations: Two-Dart Designs. Slash Method
item.description: After three previous theoretical posts, we are finally ready for practice. I hope you have already printed and prepared the 1:3 scale basic block, which I shared in the previous post. If you have just joined us or had no time to make it before, donâ€™t worry, click the link and follow the directions at the bottom of the page. In this post, we will need only the basic front bodice piece.
